blockingRead(byte[]) - Method in class org.ardulink.core.serial.jssc.SerialInputStream
Blocks until buf.length bytes are read, an error occurs, or the default timeout is hit (if specified).

Reads the next byte from the port.
read(int) - Method in class org.ardulink.core.serial.jssc.SerialInputStream
The same contract as read(), except overrides this stream's default timeout with the given timeout in milliseconds.

Non-blocking read of up to buf.length bytes from the stream.
read(byte[], int, int) - Method in class org.ardulink.core.serial.jssc.SerialInputStream

Class that wraps a SerialPort to provide InputStream functionality.
SerialInputStream(SerialPort) - Constructor for class org.ardulink.core.serial.jssc.SerialInputStream
Instantiates a SerialInputStream for the given SerialPort Do not create multiple streams for the same serial port unless you implement your own synchronization.
